mapper.select: select o.ORDE_ID, o.ORDE_BILL_NO, o.ORDE_TYPE, o.ORDE_WHARF, ct.CONT_ID, ct.CONT_CASE_NO, ct.CONT_STATE, ct.CONT_GBS_ID from ORDERD o, CONTAINER ct where 1=1 and o.ORDE_BILL_NO like '%'||#{condition.ordeBillNo}||'%' and o.ORDE_TYPE like '%'||#{condition.ordeType}||'%' and ct.CONT_CASE_NO like '%'||#{condition.contCaseNo}||'%' and o.ORDE_ID = ct.CONT_ORDE_ID and and
